name: Amaroq Organic
slogan: We create organic dog food, ethically sourced with the planet and dog in mind
description: Organic dog treats, gently air-dried, naturally healthy and tasty. Lovingly handmade from 100% pasture-fed meat from farmers we know personally. A healthy, nutritious treat and the perfect and convenient travel solution for raw-feeders.

jobs.title: Marketing Intern
jobs.description:
This is an exciting time in our journey and we are now looking for a passionate intern to join the team. You have to share a similar ethos about sustainability and animal welfare.  Working alongside the founder, your role would be to design and develop the frontend of the new website based on an existing themed web platform (e.g. wix, squarespace, wordpress) as well as support our social media activities.
Tasks will include copywriting, sourcing and editing images, conduct weekly updates on the website, and posting on various social media platforms. Your input will be incredibly valuable in the presentation and identity of the company. You will do real work whilst assisting the growth of the company from the ground up.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
This is an exciting time in our journey and we are now looking for a passionate intern to join the team. You have to share a similar ethos about sustainability and animal welfare. Working alongside the founder, your role would be to design and develop the frontend of the new website based on an existing themed web platform (e.g. wix, squarespace, wordpress) as well as support our social media activities.
Tasks will include copywriting, sourcing and editing images, conduct weekly updates on the website, and posting on various social media platforms. Your input will be incredibly valuable in the presentation and identity of the company. You will do real work whilst assisting the growth of the company from the ground up.
